Module com.example.lms
Package com.example.lms

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
com.example.lms.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Since:
: 10-06-2024 Class: BookService This class manages the collection of books in the library system. A CSV file is used to initial load the list and there are methods to add, remove, check out, and check in books. This class acts as the model in the MVC architecture.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookService

      public BookService() throws SQLException
      Initializes a new instance of the BookService class. This constructor creates an empty ArrayList to hold Book objects and populates it by loading books from the database using the BookDAO.loadBooksFromDatabase(List) method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs while loading books

  • Method Details

    • getBooks

      public List<Book> getBooks()
      Method: getBooks Purpose: Returns the list of books currently in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects.

    • loadBooksFromFile

      public void loadBooksFromFile(String filePath) throws IOException
      Method: loadBooksFromFile Purpose: Loads books from a CSV file into the book list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path and name of the CSV file to load books from.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book)
      Method: addBook Purpose: Adds a new book to the library's collection.
      Parameters:
      book - The book object to be added.

    • removeBook

      public boolean removeBook(String identifier)
      Removes a book from the database by either its barcode or title.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The book's barcode or title as a string.
      Returns:
      boolean True is book was successfully removed

    • checkOutBook

      public boolean checkOutBook(String identifier)
      Method: checkOutBook Purpose: Checks out a book from the collection using its barcode number.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The barcode or title of the book to be checked out.
      Returns:
      boolean True is book was successfully checked out.

    • checkInBook

      public boolean checkInBook(String identifier)
      Method: checkInBook Purpose: Checks in a book to the collection using its barcode number.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The barcode or title of the book to be removed.
      Returns:
      boolean True is book was checked in
